
Here are the following step to install `PPBstats`:

1. **install the R package `devtools`**
```{r, eval=FALSE}
install.packages("devtools")
```

2. **install `JAGS` software** on your computer. 
See http://mcmc-jags.sourceforge.net/ for more details.

3. **download the current version of the package**: [download v0.23](https://github.com/priviere/PPBstats/archive/v0.23.zip)

4. **unzip the folder** on your local directory 

5. **install the package** thanks to the `install` funtion from the `devtool` package 
```{r, eval=FALSE}
devtools::install("PPBstats-0.23")
```
Note that you can also load the development version:
```{r, eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_github("priviere/PPBstats")
```
The evolution of the code regarding the development version are [here](https://github.com/priviere/PPBstats/blob/master/NEWS.md).

6. **load the package** :
```{r,warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
library(PPBstats)
```
